original_text: Wicked people may have many children, but they will die in war. Their children will never have enough food to eat. Wicked people may have many children,
korean_text: 그의 자손은 번성하여도 칼을 위함이요 그의 후손은 음식물로 배부르지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: Wicked people may have many children,
sentences.korean_translation: 악인들은 많은 자녀를 가질 수 있지만,

sentences.original_text: but they will die in war.
Their children will never have enough food to eat.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 자녀들은 결코 먹을 충분한 음식을 갖지 못할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: Wicked people may have many children,
sentences.korean_translation: 악인들은 많은 자녀를 가질 수 있지만,
